project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line interface contact book application that allows users to manage contacts. The application will support adding, searching, updating, and deleting contacts, with data stored in a JSON file.

task.name: Implement feature to add a contact
Implement feature to search for a contact
Implement feature to update a contact
Implement feature to delete a contact
Implement functionality to save contacts to a JSON file
Implement functionality to load contacts from a JSON file
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
